Articles.Content:
Simple as that. For this great game. For keeping it better and better. For being so pro gamer oriented.

I get it at 0.17? (my account say I got it in the store the 2012-10-21). I love the game so much I got it on Steam also.

Thx... really this consumer oriented politics (and great game of course) just keep me recomending this great game to anyone (KSP was my first game review in Steam by the way).

Keep this level of engagement to the comunity!!! THX!

 

PS: srry for my ugly usage of the english language, I usually speak spanish

Edited July 7, 2018 by cybertario
Your English is fine.
